system.description:
Your combination of woodcraft and tactical acumen makes you uniquely suited to coordinating operations far from the comforts of civilization. You gain the following benefits:

  • When you use your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.cvkikpppbrw11411]{Mark Foe} feature on a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.t7ujv9cc4us40fj9]{Studied Adversary}, you any allies within the range of your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.d71mc2057x7y6c08]{Commanding Presence} gain the benefits of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.yuncbhlz6js1w4t4]{Hunter's Target} against that creature.
  • Half your ranger levels count as marshal levels for the purpose of gaining the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.5el685zm5ggve3sf]{Combat Directives} feature. Choose one of your ranger combat traditions. Targets of Combat Directives can also use maneuvers you know from that tradition.
  • If you have one or more of the following Exploration Knacks, when you use one, allies within the range of your Commanding Presence can use them as well: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.n9ybo2vy61nwlkpa]{Build Shelter}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.1wgwlj40lz6lj5yt]{Forced Marcher}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.oinc1czvbkl26rb5]{Guide}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.dk3vsiqq64v6iyq2]{Longwalker}.
